description.en: OP Coin protocol is a revolutionary invention of the last decade. It’s essential meaning is money digitization. It’s the first decentralized peer-to-peer payment network without using any central authority or middlemen. In a nutshell, OP Coin is internet money. Its original purpose is providing all people a universal currency for different operations. OP Coin can also be described as the most prominent triple entry bookkeeping system in existence.
